strapiSongs.title: Follow the Light
strapiSongs.lyrics:
All my life, I follow the light
Hoping it will lead somewhere
But sometimes it seems that I have no chance
‘cause everyone is there to hold me back

Don’t believe in anything
Religion is just a lie
Everyone wants something from me
But I can only be myself
strapiSongs.credits:
- Music by Victor Fisher of Reenchantment
- Originally written for Shroud of Delirium
strapiSongs.description: This classic work of doom metal from the early years with Shroud of Delirium describes the struggle of keeping a spiritual vision alive.
